Translations.Text: Tara pichata yetiya sihamte iyaka nice'i ocarata dekha paba tetiya kaphirasakalara ceharaa mlana hai paraiba arau koraa ha’ba, ‘e'itorae'i haiche se'ito, yito tomaloke dabi karaichila’
Koraa, koraacona tomaloke.. Yadi allahe moka arau mora sangisakalaka dhbansa karai diye athaba amara prati daya pradarsana karae, tente kaphirasakalaka yantranadayaka sastira paraa kone raksa karaiba
koraa, teraemi parama karaunamaya. Ami te'omra oparate'i imana anicho arau te'omra oparate'i bharasa karaicho. Gatike tomaloke anatipalame janibalai paba kone spasta bibhraantita ache
Koraa, tomaloke bhabichane, yadi tomalokara pani bhugarbhata guci yaya, tetiya kone tomalokaka prabahamana pani ani diba
nuna; kalamara sapata arau sihamte yi likhe tara sapata
tomara pratipalakara anugraha ye, tumi unmada nahaya
Arau niscaya tomara babe ache nirabicchinna puraskara
Arau niscaya tumi mahana caraitrara ucca srngata adhisthita
Eteke anatipalame tumi dekhibalai paba arau sihamte'o dekhibalai paba
niscaya tomara pratipalaka samyaka aragata sihamtara bisaye yihamte te'omra pathara paraa bicyuta haiche, arau te'om hidayata praaptasakalara bisaye'o samyaka paraijnata
Sihamte kamana karae ye, tumi aposakami horaa, tente sihamte'o aposakami ha'ba
Arau tumi anugatya nakaraiba pratyeka ene byaktira yiye adhika sapatakarai, lanchita
pithira amrata nindakarai arau yijana cogalakhurai karai phurae
Kalyanara kamata badha pradanakarai, simalanghanakarai, papistha
e'i babe'i ye, si achila dhana-sampada arau santana-santatira adhikarai
Yetiya tara ocarata amara ayatasamuha tilaraata karaa haya tetiya si kaya, e'ibora purbarartisakalara kalpa-kahini matra
